name: psutil
description: psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network). Since 2018 maintained by Juan Carlos because was abandoned.

heads.name: psutil
heads.author: Juan Carlos, John Scillieri, Nim community
heads.desc: Psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network)
